Package soot.jimple.infoflow.sourcesSinks.definitions

Class StatementSourceSinkDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.infoflow.sourcesSinks.definitions.AbstractSourceSinkDefinition
      • soot.jimple.infoflow.sourcesSinks.definitions.StatementSourceSinkDefinition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAccessPathBasedSourceSinkDefinition, ISourceSinkDefinition
    public class StatementSourceSinkDefinition
extends AbstractSourceSinkDefinition
implements IAccessPathBasedSourceSinkDefinition
    A source/sink definition that corresponds to a concrete statement in the Jimple code
    Author:
    Steven Arzt

        Returns:
